extracted_metadata.title: Defend the Harvest - Donate Today!
extracted_metadata.description: “Every family shall sit under their vine and fig tree, and they shall know no harm.” - Micah 4:4 causematch.com/defendtheharvest Settler violence is escalating, threatening Palestinian families, their land, and their safety. The olive harvest - a season rooted in history, culture, and livelihood - has become increasingly dangerous. Your support can make a difference. Donate today to Causematch.com/DefendTheHarvest and help bring hundreds of activists to the fields to provide protective presence and stand alongside Palestinians as they harvest their olives. All archival footage used in this video is thanks to B'Tselem בצלם
